attributes.review: This app is terrible. First of all when you download it it says you must enter the name of your grandmother and the year she was born. Unacceptable. The app also theretend to steel my McDonalds T-shirt if I ever deleted the app. It constantly showed me pictures of a hot Cheeto attempting and failing to lift a three pound weight. When I try to call customer services it connects me to Chuck E Cheese In which they MAKE you order a pizza with your credit card information. After numerous try‚Äôs deleting this app it took me to this hacker website in which they asked me a series of abnormal questions. For example the website asked me ‚ÄúAre you voting for the hot Cheeto this election?‚Äù Etc. When I gave up on deleting the app I decided to just throw my phone away. As I took my phone to the trash can 34 oompa lumpas started viciously attacking me. Repeating the words, ‚Äúsupport the orange‚Äù once I was able to get away I ran inside and called the White House to complain about their terrible app. I found a very disturbing message claiming I would need to ‚Äúsend my phone number for further assistance.‚Äù I find it complete and utterly disrespectful that the president is attempting to cheat on his non-speaking, speech-stealing wife with a random stranger. Now not only has this app changed my view on the election, but the president definitely lost my vote. I will never download this again And I would NEVER recommend this app to anyone. I believe they are hackers. I am completely disgusted by this app and the president. Terrible service and horrible experience. overall, terrible app. I strongly do not recommend.
